item.title: Taking chances!
item.dc:creator: alireza.6909
item.description:
hi

i know that black mesa will not come to any console neither 8th gen nor 9th gen but who knows what will happen in the future!

original half life came on ps2 years later! half life 2 came to ps3 years later too!

but i don’t know about the rights regarding original half life remake (black mesa)

i mean does valve have to have the rights from crowbar collective to make this port?

is there any petition regarding black mesa port to consoles so i sign it? (at least it’s better than nothing!)

tnx

item.title: After 9 years, Half-Life 2: MMod is available for download
item.dc:creator: RedEye9
item.description:
“The goal of Half-Life 2 : MMod is to enhance and expand gunplay, combat mechanics and the immersion factor by giving the Player more options and combat opportunities as well as refine how the Player handles his arsenal. Half-Life 2 : MMod also offers minor AI enhancements, extended abilities for combine soldiers, multiple bug fixes, enhanced visuals, VFX re-design, sound redesign and much much more, while keeping nearly every new feature in the mod totally optional.” snippet from moddb

Thanks Bluesnews.com https://www.bluesnews.com/s/196276/saturday-patches
https://www.dsogaming.com/news/after-9-years-half-life-2-mmod-is-available-for-download-improves-graphics-ai-vfx-sound-more/
https://www.moddb.com/mods/hl2-ep2-enhased-mod/downloads/half-life-2-mmod-first-release

1 post - 1 participant

Read full topic
item.source: After 9 years, Half-Life 2: MMod is available for download

item.title: Eli's Story/Arc Idea
item.dc:creator: Demolitionist1
item.description:
So I was thinking about when the game is fully completed and if the devs want to try a DLC-type of thing with a small added story, I think there should be a story with how Eli escapes Black Mesa with the infant Alyx and with Isaac (and maybe Lamar). I know it’s added work but it would be a cool idea to learn a bit of backstory about Gordon Freeman’s long time friend who we know little of in the series regarding how he got out. Again that’s if the Dev’s are willing/wanting to do that. I talked about this before in the Cafeteria and I will post it here: https://forums.blackmesasource.com/t/elis-story-adventure-idea/14904

1 post - 1 participant

Read full topic
item.source: Eli's Story/Arc Idea

item.title: Half-Life spin-off "Hunt Down The Freeman"
item.dc:creator: Source
item.description:
Half-Life spin-off “Hunt Down The Freeman” has fans outraged!
[/size]
https://www.techspot.com/news/73515-half-life-spinoff-hunt-down-freeman-has-fans.html

Royal Rudius Entertainment’s Hunt Down The Freeman is a game set in the Half-Life universe. To be clear, this is not a mod of Half-Life; it is a game licensed and built on the Source engine. The title retails for $25 on Steam but is currently being offered at a 15 percent discount until March 2…

item.title: GOLDSRC2SOURCE - Map Fixer: A tool for porting GoldSource maps to Source
item.dc:creator: VaanaCZ
item.description:
Hello
I created a tool for porting your GoldSource maps to Source. So far it features many fixes that will save hours of mindless work.

How to use[/size]

Click the Find VMF button and find the vmf file you want to repair. You can choose what fixes do you want the tool to perform. Unless you know what you’re doing, I recommend leaving them all checked. When you click Repair, the program will appear to freeze. This can take anywhere from 50 seconds to 2 minutes or more depending on the size of your map.

This tool is designed to modify .vmf files. Using it with other map formats like .map, .rmf or .jmf might result in a crash or a broken map.

Not all features are yet implemented. So far, this tool should fix most of the problems, but additional work will still be required. When compiling the map in Hammer be sure to uncheck HDR. Otherwise textures will appear to be glowing.
I recommend clicking the Help button to see a full manual and an explanation of what does what.

768×512

Thank you for reading, I hope you find it useful.

Download:
https://www.moddb.com/games/half-life-source/downloads/goldsrc2source-map-fixer
https://drive.google.com/file/d/16Bz9rnZm61L-G-6pzA6DImqIjJXg5K0O/view?usp=sharing

3 posts - 2 participants

Read full topic
item.source: GOLDSRC2SOURCE - Map Fixer: A tool for porting GoldSource maps to Source

item.title: Half Life SFM Series by PinWheel Arts
item.dc:creator: Johnwalter
item.description:
Hey everyone, i just found about this gem of a channel.
One guy is making SFM movies within the Black Mesa, following the games story with amazing details and animation. Plus some new touches.

1st episode: Half-Life: Anomalous Materials [SFM]

2nd episode: Half-Life: Unforeseen Consequences Part One [SFM]

I think the animations is smooth, though a bit unfinished and rushed.
But the story and added details are great!

item.title: Half-Life PS2 Multiplayer Maps Released!
item.dc:creator: deadlife101
item.description:
Alright so thanks to a fantastic conversion tool over on github (link in moddb description); the Half-Life Playstation 2 port’s multiplayer maps are finally fully playable on the PC/Steam version of Half-Life! I hope everyone gets as much enjoyment out of these maps as I have. Each of these maps are unique to the PS2 port of Half-Life and even the ones that were included in the original version of Half-Life have had changes made to them. Most of these maps are pretty small but some, like “Waypoint” are pretty dang fun and worth playing in my opinion.

Also fyi I have no involvement with the github team whatsoever, I’m just super happy to finally be able to play these maps on PC, so thanks so much to those guys wherever they might be for allowing me to convert these maps for every Half-Life fan out there.

Maps included: Basement, Datacore, Debris, Office, Signal, Skirmish, Snarkpit, Stalkyard, Water Canal, Waypoint.

Link to moddb download: https://www.moddb.com/games/half-life/addons/half-life-ps2-deathmatch-maps-for-pcsteam

Bonus: And for all of you Half-Life deathmatch enthusiasts out there here’s a link to Half-Life: Further Data + dm_office. Further Data is a collection of maps, sprays, and player models released by valve years ago that isn’t included in the Steam version of Half-Life. Dm_office comes from the unreleased Dreamcast port of Half-Life and is more or less the same as the Office map from the PS2 port. https://www.moddb.com/games/half-life/addons/half-life-further-data-dm-office

I hope everyone has a great time with these maps!

1 post - 1 participant

Read full topic
item.source: Half-Life PS2 Multiplayer Maps Released!

item.description:
Marc Laidlaw posted this on his blog tonight, and I think this is the closest we’re going to get to a conclusion to Half-Life.
Some assembly required, as it’s an IP-free bizarro world, but it’s closure.

item.title: Half-Life (Live Action) The Freeman Chronicles: Episode 2: Part 1
item.dc:creator: CatzEyes93
item.description:
youtube.com/watch?v=TaN3sVvVYVk

Episode 2: Part 1 of the Half-Life fan series made by fans and funded by fans. PLEASE SHARE.

Episode One if you missed it: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7GJ1C…

This episode picks up after the first and follows the characters as they negotiate the Hydro electric sub station on their way to the Lambda complex.

If you like this one, Part 2 will really make you smile.

And yep, I did some voice over work for these guys too.
